message: Seriously... The whole purpose of tagging is so STRANGERS can find your photo. Even if it wasn't in croc's Instagram, anyone looking for crocs pictures could see it. And tagging a brand is the web equivalent of giving them a call. Come on now... Fix your privacy settings before getting pissed off at nothing.
